pages.text: $(li)The Redstone Torch is a variant of the common Torchs.$(br)$(li)It works as a toggeable redstone power source and it can be used to craft multiple items in a Crafting Table.
$(li)It can be used to transport redstone signals vertically, but I recommend use Cog Blocks for that function.
